author: Andy Eckardt
title: Switzerland's postal service issues 'COVID-19 Solidarity' stamp
description: Switzerland's postal service issues a 'COVID-19 Solidarity' stamp.
content:
France sees highest one-day death toll with 1,417 killed
France has reported its highest one-day death toll since the coronavirus outbreak began with 1,417 people killed Tuesday, according to an NBC News tally.
It brings the country's overall death toll to … [+4609 chars]
